description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $572.3K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Bursey Excavating Development. The average
  contract duration was 0.45 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.0M. The longest
  contract was 1.03 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $3.6M.
lookup_name: 'BURSEY EXCAVATING DEVELOPMENT'

s431_number_of_contracts: '10'

s422_max_contract_value: '3.6M'
